    • translate

      public void translate(Vector3 translation)
      Applies translation to this matrix. Intended for building a transformation matrix from an identity() matrix. Should be applied before rotation and scaling.
      See Also:
      • rotate(double, Vector3)
      • scale(Vector3)

    • rotate

      public void rotate(double radians, Vector3 axis)
      Applies a rotation of radians about axis on this matrix. Intended for building a transformation matrix from an identity() matrix. Should be applied after translation but before scaling. Assumes that axis is a unit vector.
      See Also:
      • scale(Vector3)
      • translate(Vector3)

    • scale

      public void scale(Vector3 scale)
      Applies scale to this matrix. Intended for building a transformation matrix from an identity() matrix. Should be applied after translation and rotation.
      See Also:
      • translate(Vector3)
      • rotate(double, Vector3)

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Sets this matrix to the identity() matrix.
